scripts.initialize: php artisan key:generate && php artisan jwt:secret
scripts.google-apatxee-dev: gcloud config set account inviertenavarra@gmail.com && gcloud app deploy  --project=ecommerce-apatxee-v2 ./apatxee.yaml
scripts.google-alterhome-dev: gcloud config set account contacto@leangasoftware.es && gcloud app deploy  --project=alterhome-ecommerce ./alterhome.yaml
scripts.google-mochileros-dev: gcloud config set account leifer33@gmail.com && gcloud app deploy  --project=mochileros-ecommerce ./mochileros.yaml
scripts.seed: php artisan db:seed --class=UsersTableSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=ShopTableSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=ProductsTableSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=PurchaseTableSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=OrderSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=PurchaseDetailTableSeeder && php artisan db:seed --class=ZoneAvailableTableSeeder
